00281 
00285     NS(lang,String)     path( const NS(lang,String)& filename="" ) const;
00286 
00291     bool                isKeyDown( KeyType key ) const;
00292 
00296     static App*         get();
00297 
00301     static const char*  toString( KeyType key );
00302 
00303     /*
00304      * USED BY PLATFORM SPECIFIC IMPLEMENTATION.
00305      * Note that platform specific implementation needs to use this
00306      * since otherwise the state returned by isKeyDown state is not right.
00307      * Note also that for example focus losing/gaining might cause
00308      * key state buffer to be reset, so thats why better that
00309      * platform specific impl handles everything instead of user application.
00310      * Note that assumed behavior for focus lost/gain is that
00311      * all key states are set to false, i.e. to application losing/gaining
00312      * focus always looks like all the keys were released.
00313      * Sets key down state.
00314      * @see isKeyDown
00315      */
00316     void                setKeyDown( KeyType key, bool down );
00317 
00318     /*
00319      * USED BY PLATFORM SPECIFIC IMPLEMENTATION.
00320      * Returns true if application has requested exit.
00321      */
00322     bool                quitRequested() const;
00323 
00324     /*
00325      * USED BY PLATFORM SPECIFIC IMPLEMENTATION.
00326      * Deletes application instance. 
00327      */
00328     static void         deleteApp();
00329 
00330     /*
00331      * USED BY PLATFORM SPECIFIC IMPLEMENTATION.
00332      * Returns true if App has been initialized.
00333      */
00334     static bool         initialized();
00335 
00336 private:
00337     OSInterface*        m_os;
00338     NS(io,PathName)     m_dataPath;
00339     bool                m_keyDown[KEY_COUNT];
00340     bool                m_quit;
00341 
00342     App( const App& );
00343     App& operator=( const App& );
00344 };
